extracted_playbook.title: Update JT2Go
extracted_playbook.description: Update JT2Go to version V2406.0003 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which version of Teamcenter Visualization is installed?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.2
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.2 to version V14.2.0.13 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.3
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V14.3 to version V14.3.0.11 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2312
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2312 to version V2312.0008 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2406
extracted_playbook.description: Update Teamcenter Visualization V2406 to version V2406.0003 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Opening Untrusted XML Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open untrusted XML files in affected applications to reduce risk of exploitation for CVE-2024-37996 and CVE-2024-37997.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control System Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
